<template>
    
</template>

<script>
import axios from 'axios'

export default{
    name: 'RelatorioTurmas',
    data(){
        return {
            URL: "http://localhost:4000",
            turmas: [],
        }
    },
    methods:{
        getAllTurmas() {
            axios.get(`${this.URL}/turmas`).then(response => {
                this.turmas = response.data
            })
            .catch(error => {
                console.log(error);
            })
        },
    },
    mounted(){

    },
}
</script>

<style>
    .titulo {
        text-align: center;
        font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
    }
</style>
